Record Listing

  1. To access Records Listings page, click 'Records' from the main menu at the top of the screen.
  2. Record Type Selector: Use the arrow next to the record type to select a new record type. Available record types include:
    1. Subfiles
    2. Persons
    3. Authorized Agents
    4. Water Rights
    5. Points of Diverions (POD)
    6. Places of Use (POU)
    7. Documents
  3. Filtering Records
    1. Open Filters by clicking 'Filters' (below the main navigation)
    2. Select Filters
    3. Click 'Apply Filters'
  4. Search Records: you can search the records using the search field next to the filters button. Clicking the dropdown allows you to change the search criteria.
  5. Adding a Record: you can add a some record types to WRATS from the record list screen
    1. Click 'Add Record'
    2. Complete the form and submit the form
  6. Row Functionality: each row has columns of information. Each row also has a few additional features:
    1. Hovering over a circle with dots lets you see hidden content.
    2. Clicking on row will take you to the specific record detail screen
  7. Bulk Features: each record type includes certain bulk features. To use bulk actions:
    1. click the square checkbox at the left of the record rows you want to select
    2. click the specific bulk action at the bottom of the screen
    3. complete the instruction in the modal to perform the bulk action
